snippet: A fourth-generation S.U.V. gets what it needs to keep pace in a fiercely competitive segment with a refined suspension, better visibility and, on the high end, a near-luxury interior.
abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Kia Sportage.
lead_paragraph: A fourth-generation S.U.V. gets what it needs to keep pace in a fiercely competitive segment with a refined suspension, better visibility and, on the high end, a near-luxury interior.

headline.print_headline: Kia Sportage Gets a Stylish Makeover
headline.main: Video Review: Kia Sportage Gets a Stylish Makeover
